ReportSection.title:
AGE-WELL EPIC Summer Institute, 2018
Co-Creating Possibilities: Leisure, Recreation and Wellness - Opportunities for Engaging the Older Adult
ReportSection.ReportItem:
AGE-WELL NCE is pleased to offer this exciting and innovative training event to AGE-WELL HQP across Canada.  Our third summer institute’s theme: leisure, recreation and wellness, will be the focal point for a week of engaging workshops, lectures, and activities on participatory, user-centred design.

The AGE-WELL EPIC Summer Institute, 2018 will provide HQP with an unparalleled opportunity to work closely with expert mentors and develop a solution that focuses on fostering opportunities for engaging physically active older adults.  AGE-WELL solutions involve three types of “products”: technologies (e.g. home monitoring networks), services (e.g. integration of a technology into community services), and policies (e.g. plans to ensure funds saved in one sector flow to another).

Summer Institute participants will be challenged to consider this year’s theme from all perspectives and to develop multi-faceted practical solutions. Throughout the week, HQP teams will work through the design process from problem definition to brainstorming and business models to prototyping, culminating in a “pitch competition” with cash prize.

AGE-WELL will book and cover the cost of accommodation (double-occupancy) at The Banff Centre for four nights plus breakfast, lunch, and coffee breaks. Additionally, AGE-WELL will cover the cost of roundtrip economy flights between your home airport and the Calgary International Airport. AGE-WELL will organize shuttle service from the Calgary International Airport to The Banff Centre and again from The Banff Centre to the airport on Friday.

AGE-WELL will not provide HQP dinner, a per diem, or cover the cost of luggage fees. Please see the AGE-WELL Travel Policy for more details and contact krystle@agewell-nce.ca if you have any questions.

Requests for additional funding (e.g. extra hotel night) will be considered upon request. Please include details in your application.

Who: AGE-WELL HQP only
What: EPIC Summer Institute – Co-Creating Possibilities: Leisure, Recreation and Wellness - Opportunities for Engaging the Older Adult
Where: The Banff Centre, Banff, Alberta
When: June 18-22, 2018

Eligibility:

Applicants must be current network HQP in good standing (e.g. have completed reporting requirements, returned all signed documents etc.) who have not attended a previous AGE-WELL Summer Institute
Preference will be given to HQP who have made measurable progress towards completing, or have completed, the EPIC (Early Professionals, Inspired Careers) training program

Application Requirements:

  • Fully completed application form
  • Current CV

Application Procedure:

Please answer each question thoroughly and enter your typed single-spaced responses into the text boxes provided. Completed applications are due in Forum by 11:59pmET on 26 March 2018.

Selection Procedure:

All complete applications will be reviewed by members of the Summer Institute Steering committee. HQP selected to attend will be contacted via email in mid-April, 2018.
